HTMLImageElementLoading.summary:
The
property loading is a string whose value provides a hint
to the user agent on how to handle the loading of the image which
is currently outside the window's visual viewport.

remarks.para:
This helps
to optimize the loading of the document's contents by postponing loading the image until
it's expected to be needed, rather than immediately during the initial page load.

-The img element
-Web performance in the MDN Learning Area
-Lazy loading in the MDN web
performance guide
